

I AM HERE 
sidebox: 

Explain 
select configuration_key as cfgKey, configuration_value as cfgValue
                          from zen_product_type_layout;



I AM HERE 
sidebox: 

Explain 
select value
              from zen_sessions
              where sesskey = 'uiuopa60oko0srhjb0iii4emt1'
              and expiry > '1326814555';



I AM HERE 
sidebox: 

Explain 
select template_dir from zen_template_select where template_language in (1, 0) order by template_language DESC;



I AM HERE 
sidebox: 

Explain 
select banners_id, date_scheduled
                      from zen_banners
                      where date_scheduled != 'NULL';



I AM HERE 
sidebox: 

Explain 
select b.banners_id, b.expires_date, b.expires_impressions,
                             sum(bh.banners_shown) as banners_shown
                      from zen_banners b, zen_banners_history bh
                      where b.status = 1
                      and b.banners_id = bh.banners_id
                      group by b.banners_id, b.expires_date, b.expires_impressions;



I AM HERE 
sidebox: 

Explain 
select specials_id, products_id
                       from zen_specials
                       where status = '0'
                       and (((specials_date_available <= 20120117 and specials_date_available != '0001-01-01') and (expires_date > 20120117))
                       or ((specials_date_available <= 20120117 and specials_date_available != '0001-01-01') and (expires_date = '0001-01-01'))
                       or (specials_date_available = '0001-01-01' and expires_date > 20120117))
                       ;



I AM HERE 
sidebox: 

Explain 
select specials_id, products_id
                       from zen_specials
                       where status = '1'
                       and (20120117 < specials_date_available and specials_date_available != '0001-01-01')
                       ;



I AM HERE 
sidebox: 

Explain 
select specials_id, products_id
                       from zen_specials
                       where status = '1'
                       and ((20120117 >= expires_date and expires_date != '0001-01-01')
                       or (20120117 < specials_date_available and specials_date_available != '0001-01-01'));



I AM HERE 
sidebox: 

Explain 
select featured_id
                       from zen_featured
                       where status = '0'
                       and (((featured_date_available <= 20120117 and featured_date_available != '0001-01-01') and (expires_date > 20120117))
                       or ((featured_date_available <= 20120117 and featured_date_available != '0001-01-01') and (expires_date = '0001-01-01'))
                       or (featured_date_available = '0001-01-01' and expires_date > 20120117))
                       ;



I AM HERE 
sidebox: 

Explain 
select featured_id
                       from zen_featured
                       where status = '1'
                       and (20120117 < featured_date_available and featured_date_available != '0001-01-01')
                       ;



I AM HERE 
sidebox: 

Explain 
select featured_id
                       from zen_featured
                       where status = '1'
                       and ((20120117 >= expires_date and expires_date != '0001-01-01')
                       or (20120117 < featured_date_available and featured_date_available != '0001-01-01'));



I AM HERE 
sidebox: 

Explain 
select sale_id
                       from zen_salemaker_sales
                       where sale_status = '0'
                       and (((sale_date_start <= 20120117 and sale_date_start != '0001-01-01') and (sale_date_end > 20120117))
                       or ((sale_date_start <= 20120117 and sale_date_start != '0001-01-01') and (sale_date_end = '0001-01-01'))
                       or (sale_date_start = '0001-01-01' and sale_date_end > 20120117))
                       ;



I AM HERE 
sidebox: 

Explain 
select sale_id
                       from zen_salemaker_sales
                       where sale_status = '1'
                       and (20120117 < sale_date_start and sale_date_start != '0001-01-01')
                       ;



I AM HERE 
sidebox: 

Explain 
select sale_id
                       from zen_salemaker_sales
                       where sale_status = '1'
                       and ((20120117 >= sale_date_end and sale_date_end != '0001-01-01')
                       or (20120117 < sale_date_start and sale_date_start != '0001-01-01'));



I AM HERE 
sidebox: 

Explain 
select configuration_value from zen_configuration where configuration_key='ADMIN_DEMO';



I AM HERE 
sidebox: 

Explain 
select * from zen_admin where admin_name='demo' or admin_name='Admin';



I AM HERE 
sidebox: 

Explain 
select code, title, symbol_left, symbol_right, decimal_point, 
                                         thousands_point, decimal_places, value 
                                  from zen_currencies;



I AM HERE 
sidebox: 

Explain 
select type_handler from zen_product_types where type_id = '1';



I AM HERE 
sidebox: 

Explain 
select * from zen_product_types;



I AM HERE 
sidebox: 

Explain 
select languages_id, name, code, image, directory
                               from zen_languages order by sort_order;



I AM HERE 
sidebox: 

Explain 
SELECT project_version_major, project_version_minor FROM zen_project_version WHERE project_version_key = 'Zen-Cart Database';



I AM HERE 
sidebox: 

Explain 
select configuration_value from zen_configuration where configuration_key='MODULE_PAYMENT_INSTALLED';



I AM HERE 
sidebox: 

Explain 
select configuration_value from zen_configuration where configuration_key='MODULE_SHIPPING_INSTALLED';



I AM HERE 
sidebox: 

Explain 
select * from zen_coupon_gv_queue where release_flag='N';



I AM HERE 
sidebox: 

Explain 
select configuration_group_id as cgID, 
                                                       configuration_group_title as cgTitle 
                                                from zen_configuration_group 
                                                where visible = '1' order by sort_order;



I AM HERE 
sidebox: 

Explain 
select count(*) as count
                             from zen_categories
                             where parent_id = '2';



I AM HERE 
sidebox: 

Explain 
select count(*) as total
                                from zen_products p, zen_products_to_categories p2c
                                where p.products_id = p2c.products_id
                                and p.products_status = 1
                                and p2c.categories_id = '2' limit 1;



I AM HERE 
sidebox: 

Explain 
select cd.categories_name, c.parent_id
                                from zen_categories c, zen_categories_description cd
                                where c.categories_id = '2'
                                and c.categories_id = cd.categories_id
                                and cd.language_id = '1';



I AM HERE 
sidebox: 

Explain 
select c.categories_id, cd.categories_name, c.parent_id
                                from zen_categories c, zen_categories_description cd
                                where c.categories_id = cd.categories_id
                                and cd.language_id = '1'
                                and c.parent_id = '0'
                                order by c.sort_order, cd.categories_name;



I AM HERE 
sidebox: 

Explain 
select c.categories_id, cd.categories_name, c.parent_id
                                from zen_categories c, zen_categories_description cd
                                where c.categories_id = cd.categories_id
                                and cd.language_id = '1'
                                and c.parent_id = '2'
                                order by c.sort_order, cd.categories_name;



I AM HERE 
sidebox: 

Explain 
select c.categories_id, cd.categories_name, c.parent_id
                                from zen_categories c, zen_categories_description cd
                                where c.categories_id = cd.categories_id
                                and cd.language_id = '1'
                                and c.parent_id = '3'
                                order by c.sort_order, cd.categories_name;



I AM HERE 
sidebox: 

Explain 
select c.categories_id, cd.categories_name, c.parent_id
                                from zen_categories c, zen_categories_description cd
                                where c.categories_id = cd.categories_id
                                and cd.language_id = '1'
                                and c.parent_id = '4'
                                order by c.sort_order, cd.categories_name;



I AM HERE 
sidebox: 

Explain 
select c.categories_id, cd.categories_name, c.parent_id
                                from zen_categories c, zen_categories_description cd
                                where c.categories_id = cd.categories_id
                                and cd.language_id = '1'
                                and c.parent_id = '1'
                                order by c.sort_order, cd.categories_name;



I AM HERE 
sidebox: 

Explain 
select c.categories_id, cd.categories_name, cd.categories_description, c.categories_image,
                                         c.parent_id, c.sort_order, c.date_added, c.last_modified,
                                         c.categories_status
                                  from zen_categories c, zen_categories_description cd
                                  where c.parent_id = '2'
                                  and c.categories_id = cd.categories_id
                                  and cd.language_id = '1' order by c.sort_order, cd.categories_name;



I AM HERE 
sidebox: 

Explain 
select count(*) as total  from zen_products p, zen_products_description pd, zen_products_to_categories p2c                                 where p.products_id = pd.products_id                                 and pd.language_id = '1'                                 and p.products_id = p2c.products_id                                 and p2c.categories_id = '2';



I AM HERE 
sidebox: 

Explain 
select p.products_type, p.products_id, pd.products_name, p.products_quantity,                                        p.products_image, p.products_price, p.products_date_added,                                        p.products_last_modified, p.products_date_available,                                        p.products_status, p.products_model,                                        p.products_quantity_order_min, p.products_quantity_order_units, p.products_priced_by_attribute,                                        p.product_is_free, p.product_is_call, p.products_quantity_mixed, p.product_is_always_free_shipping,                                        p.products_quantity_order_max, p.products_sort_order                                 from zen_products p, zen_products_description pd, zen_products_to_categories p2c                                 where p.products_id = pd.products_id                                 and pd.language_id = '1'                                 and p.products_id = p2c.products_id                                 and p2c.categories_id = '2' order by p.products_sort_order, pd.products_name limit 0, 10;



I AM HERE 
sidebox: 

Explain 
select (avg(reviews_rating) / 5 * 100) as average_rating
                                 from zen_reviews
                                 where products_id = '2';



I AM HERE 
sidebox: 

Explain 
select type_handler from zen_product_types where type_id = '1';



I AM HERE 
sidebox: 

Explain 
select products_tax_class_id, products_price, products_priced_by_attribute, product_is_free, product_is_call from zen_products where products_id = '2' limit 1;



I AM HERE 
sidebox: 

Explain 
select products_price, products_priced_by_attribute from zen_products where products_id = '2';



I AM HERE 
sidebox: 

Explain 
select options_id, price_prefix, options_values_price, attributes_display_only, attributes_price_base_included, round(concat(price_prefix, options_values_price), 5) as value from zen_products_attributes where products_id = '2' and attributes_display_only != '1' and attributes_price_base_included='1' order by options_id, value;



I AM HERE 
sidebox: 

Explain 
select products_price, products_model, products_priced_by_attribute from zen_products where products_id = '2';



I AM HERE 
sidebox: 

Explain 
select products_price, products_priced_by_attribute from zen_products where products_id = '2';



I AM HERE 
sidebox: 

Explain 
select options_id, price_prefix, options_values_price, attributes_display_only, attributes_price_base_included, round(concat(price_prefix, options_values_price), 5) as value from zen_products_attributes where products_id = '2' and attributes_display_only != '1' and attributes_price_base_included='1' order by options_id, value;

sidebox: 

Explain 
select specials_new_products_price from zen_specials where products_id = '2' and status='1';



I AM HERE 
sidebox: 

Explain 
select products_price, products_model, products_priced_by_attribute from zen_products where products_id = '2';

Explain 
select products_price, products_priced_by_attribute from zen_products where products_id = '2';



I AM HERE 
sidebox: 

Explain 
select options_id, price_prefix, options_values_price, attributes_display_only, attributes_price_base_included, round(concat(price_prefix, options_values_price), 5) as value from zen_products_attributes where products_id = '2' and attributes_display_only != '1' and attributes_price_base_included='1' order by options_id, value;



I AM HERE 
sidebox: 

Explain 
select specials_new_products_price from zen_specials where products_id = '2' and status='1';



I AM HERE 
sidebox: 

Explain 
select master_categories_id from zen_products where products_id = '2';



I AM HERE 
sidebox: 

Explain 
select sale_specials_condition, sale_deduction_value, sale_deduction_type from zen_salemaker_sales where sale_categories_all like '%,2,%' and sale_status = '1' and (sale_date_start <= now() or sale_date_start = '0001-01-01') and (sale_date_end >= now() or sale_date_end = '0001-01-01') and (sale_pricerange_from <= '18.0000' or sale_pricerange_from = '0') and (sale_pricerange_to >= '18.0000' or sale_pricerange_to = '0');



I AM HERE 
sidebox: 

Explain 
select SUM(tax_rate) as tax_rate
                         from (zen_tax_rates tr
                         left join zen_zones_to_geo_zones za
                         ON tr.tax_zone_id = za.geo_zone_id
                         left join zen_geo_zones tz ON tz.geo_zone_id = tr.tax_zone_id )
                         WHERE (za.zone_country_id IS NULL
                         OR za.zone_country_id = 0
                         OR za.zone_country_id = '223')
                         AND (za.zone_id IS NULL OR za.zone_id = 0
                         OR za.zone_id = '19')
                         AND tr.tax_class_id = '0'
                         GROUP BY tr.tax_priority;



I AM HERE 
sidebox: 

Explain 
select SUM(tax_rate) as tax_rate
                         from (zen_tax_rates tr
                         left join zen_zones_to_geo_zones za
                         ON tr.tax_zone_id = za.geo_zone_id
                         left join zen_geo_zones tz ON tz.geo_zone_id = tr.tax_zone_id )
                         WHERE (za.zone_country_id IS NULL
                         OR za.zone_country_id = 0
                         OR za.zone_country_id = '223')
                         AND (za.zone_id IS NULL OR za.zone_id = 0
                         OR za.zone_id = '19')
                         AND tr.tax_class_id = '0'
                         GROUP BY tr.tax_priority;



I AM HERE 
sidebox: 

Explain 
select * from zen_products_to_categories where products_id=2;



I AM HERE 
sidebox: 

Explain 
select pa.products_attributes_id
                           from zen_products_attributes pa
                           where pa.products_id = '2' limit 1;

sidebox: 

Explain 
select products_type from zen_products where products_id='2';

                             from zen_meta_tags_products_description
                             where products_id = '2'
                             and language_id = '1';

select metatags_description
                             from zen_meta_tags_products_description
                             where products_id = '2'
                             and language_id = '1';

sidebox: 

Explain

select master_categories_id from zen_products where products_id = '1';



I AM HERE 
sidebox: 

Explain 
select sale_specials_condition, sale_deduction_value, sale_deduction_type from zen_salemaker_sales where sale_categories_all like '%,2,%' and sale_status = '1' and (sale_date_start <= now() or sale_date_start = '0001-01-01') and (sale_date_end >= now() or sale_date_end = '0001-01-01') and (sale_pricerange_from <= '20.0000' or sale_pricerange_from = '0') and (sale_pricerange_to >= '20.0000' or sale_pricerange_to = '0');



I AM HERE 
sidebox: 

Explain 
select SUM(tax_rate) as tax_rate
                         from (zen_tax_rates tr
                         left join zen_zones_to_geo_zones za
                         ON tr.tax_zone_id = za.geo_zone_id
                         left join zen_geo_zones tz ON tz.geo_zone_id = tr.tax_zone_id )
                         WHERE (za.zone_country_id IS NULL
                         OR za.zone_country_id = 0
                         OR za.zone_country_id = '223')
                         AND (za.zone_id IS NULL OR za.zone_id = 0
                         OR za.zone_id = '19')
                         AND tr.tax_class_id = '0'
                         GROUP BY tr.tax_priority;



I AM HERE 
sidebox: 

Explain 
select SUM(tax_rate) as tax_rate
                         from (zen_tax_rates tr
                         left join zen_zones_to_geo_zones za
                         ON tr.tax_zone_id = za.geo_zone_id
                         left join zen_geo_zones tz ON tz.geo_zone_id = tr.tax_zone_id )
                         WHERE (za.zone_country_id IS NULL
                         OR za.zone_country_id = 0
                         OR za.zone_country_id = '223')
                         AND (za.zone_id IS NULL OR za.zone_id = 0
                         OR za.zone_id = '19')
                         AND tr.tax_class_id = '0'
                         GROUP BY tr.tax_priority;

Explain 
select * from zen_products_to_categories where products_id=1;

sidebox: 

Explain 
select pa.products_attributes_id
                           from zen_products_attributes pa
                           where pa.products_id = '1' limit 1;

                             from zen_meta_tags_products_description
                             where products_id = '1'
                             and language_id = '1';



I AM HERE 
sidebox: 

Explain 
select metatags_description
                             from zen_meta_tags_products_description
                             where products_id = '1'
                             and language_id = '1';



I AM HERE 
sidebox: 

Explain 
select ptc.product_type_id, pt.type_name from zen_product_types_to_category ptc, zen_product_types pt
          where ptc.category_id = '2'
          and pt.type_id = ptc.product_type_id;



I AM HERE 
sidebox: 

Explain 
select type_id, type_name from zen_product_types;



I AM HERE 
sidebox: 

Explain 
select count(*) as products_errors from zen_products_to_categories where categories_id = 0;



I AM HERE 
sidebox: 

Explain 
SELECT * from zen_project_version WHERE project_version_key = 'Zen-Cart Database' ORDER BY project_version_date_applied DESC LIMIT 1;



I AM HERE 
sidebox: 

Explain 
select count(*) as total
              from zen_sessions
              where sesskey = 'uiuopa60oko0srhjb0iii4emt1';
